title: List of NCAA Division I FBS receiving yards leaders
text:
The following are a lists of the <a href="American%20football">football</a> <a href="wide%20receiver">wide receiver</a>s in <a href="National%20Collegiate%20Athletic%20Association">NCAA</a> <a href="NCAA%20Division%20I%20Football%20Bowl%20Subdivision">Division I FBS</a> ranked in the top 30 for receiving yards in a career, single season, or single game.
Note that only seasons played at the FBS level are included on this list, affecting players like <a href="Randy%20Moss">Randy Moss</a>, whose team transitioned to FBS during his career. Also, per NCAA rules, stats from <a href="bowl%20game">bowl game</a>s prior to 2002 are not included in these lists.
